tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very good experience, she explains the root cause and provides appropriate treatment. Would definitely recommend to anyone experiencing allergic reactions.

tags: None
review:
I recently visited Dr. Shilpa to discuss my severe allergic reaction history, as I was concerned about traveling abroad. She was incredibly helpful and reassuring, explaining all the emergency measures I should take in case of a severe reaction when hospitals may not be readily available in a foreign land. 

Additionally, she provided me with all the necessary documentation to carry my medicines. Thanks to her guidance and support, I now feel confident and less worried about managing my severe allergy while traveling abroad. Thank you, Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Both the doctor as well as the nurse Mrs.Kushalkar were equally cordial and professional. I was able to explain my issues based on which a detailed allergy test was conducted. Subsequent to the outcome of the test, customised medicine would be provided (not immediately. I am told to come and collect or they can courier it) The doc gave a lucid explanation of the diagnosis results and how it can be arrested. She will proceed only once the patient is throughly convinced with the treatment. I can only comment about the outcome once my treatment starts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I suffer from allergies both food and environmental. I came to India for a short visit and my allergies flared up. I googled online and I found Dr. Nayak. She has been treating me for over 8 months. My experience with her has been amazing.  She is such a wonderful person, takes her time to explain your illness with you in details. I had my allergy test done at her clinic and that was painless !! I have a phobia for needles and they took great care to give me a pain free experience.  I would highly recommend her to anyone who has issues with allergies.

tags: None
review: I went in for cat dander immunotherapy. The doctor just wanted to give me medication for 3 to 6 months *** **** ***** ******** She said no to giving 1 month medicine to start with. ****** *************** *****

tags: None
review: While we had a confirmed booking, Doctor consultant had a flight to catch and hence was very much in hurry. Did not even do a physical checkup of my child who is suffering from consistent cough and runny nose.  She looked to hurry in and recommend some tests  for further investigation.. Which looked a bit strange. I was looking to expect  a detailed  assessment considering that she is a specialist some quality inputs and willingness to address concerns of the parents. But came away completely disappointed.  I hope she reads this and makes amends for future instances

tags: None
review: I had an excellent experience sitting down with Dr. Shilpa and discussing various things about my current situation and how they all relate to allergies. Unlike many other doctors I've met in Mumbai, she was extremely patient and listened to everything I had to say and spent ample amount of time with me before recommending a few steps and tests to me. If any of you are suffering from any allergies or allergy related issues like autoimmune diseases, getting an opinion from Dr. Shilpa is highly recommended.

tags: None
review:
Doctor Shilpa Nayak is amongst the most friendly doctors that you would ever meet!
She is very patient to hear each and every detail of her patient's problem/suffering. She would then do the detection/test required for the same. And only after cross checking properly will suggest you only those medicines which will actually be needed.
Very rarely do you meet such doctors who actually try to cure you with as less as medicines as possible.
Had a very very lovely and informative experience with Dr. Shilpa,  would definitely recommend her to whoever needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

Allergy is a complex problem for any patient to understand but she cleared all my doubts, queries and explained me the Do‚Äôs and Dont‚Äôs to manage my condition better. Would definitely recommend Dr. Shilpa to anyone who is struggling with Allergies

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

review: The doctor is genuinely sweet, caring and friendly. She understands the problem as a whole, and not just the symptoms. She takes the time to address the issue. She isn't just a doctor, she is a healer. I got more than my money's worth. Very happy to have visited her.

review: She is probably one of the best doctor I have met from quite sometime in Mumbai. She is very good in explaining the problem and finding the root cause of it. She is very friendly, enthusiastic, Very much well satisfied with the explaination.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

Dr. Shilpa is one of very few doctors who actually take the time and attention to hear out their patients' predicaments than only be interested in patient turnover. 
She approached my allergic rhinitis from the perspective of explanation and did not talk 'down' to me as a layman. I will try her treatment but as far as consultation and diagnosis go - Dr. Shilpa Nayak is truly excellent.
